author: John Mauro
description:
By Blood, By Salt is the debut novel by J.L. Odom and the recently crowned champion of Mark Lawrence’s tenth Self-Published Fantasy Blog-Off (SPFBO), narrowly edging out second-place finisher Mushroom Blues by Adrian M. Gibson. In his own review of the book, Mark Lawrence declared By Blood, By Salt to be “one of my favourite of […]

The post REVIEW: By Blood, By Salt by J.L. Odom appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: By Blood, By Salt by J.L. Odom
